mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language_capacity (userId, language, readAndWrite, listenAndSpeak, index, createTimeStamp, lastUpdateStamp, isDel) values (#{userId}, #{language}, #{readAndWrite}, #{listenAndSpeak}, #{index}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM language_capacity WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE language_capacity SET language=#{language}, readAndWrite=#{readAndWrite}, listenAndSpeak=#{listenAndSpeak}, index=#{index}, lastUpdateStamp=unix_timestamp(now()) WHERE id = #{id}
